title: Dialogos across generations w/ Lorcan McSharp -  Voices with Vervaeke
description: Lorcan is the person who makes my short videos which have continued to impress me. Here we really enter into dialogos, and I am deeply reminded of Zac Stein's point about education across the generations and Paul Vanderklay's point about scalability. Lorcan and I each draw each other out and into something that transcends us both.
